ab.p:
in to his place and so than the pacient shall
speke.

head.title:
For a stroke in the heed where tho-
rugh the heed is swollen.

ab.p:
Take a sou-
kyng whelpe & clene it & ley it al hoot to þe
heed of the pacient al anyght & that wol take
oute the bolnyng & swellynge & make the wounde
clere to þe leche.
